Having a good time in #Dubai:) thanxx to my lovely fans for your incredible love :) enjoy my new song #aankhmarey .. @ranveersingh @saraalikhan95 @simmbathefilm ..
A post shared by Mika Singh (@mikasingh) on Dec 11, 2018 at 8:12am PST
title: Amidst The News Of His Arrest, Singer Mika Singh Shares He's Having a 'Good Time' In Dubai
description: Mika Singh was accused of sending inappropriate pictures to a 17-year-old Brazilian model. Following this, he was reportedly arrested in Dubai. He was taken to Abu Dhabi as the accused was a resident of the place. Amid all of this, Mika Singh, today, posted a video of him having a gala time in Dubai.
